pages.text: $(bgreen)Sea Shroom$() has never seen the sea. It's in his name, he's heard loads about it, but he's just never found the time. One day, though, it'll go down.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)0$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)medium range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)one spore$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy. $(bred)It will sleep at daytime and lives in water$$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)a spore each tick$() which last 1 seconds.$(bred)It will activate other nearby Sea Shrooms to be in super mode$().
